DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the potential pharmacokinetic (PK) interaction of multiple oral doses of HCV-796 and a single dose of desipramine when coadministered to healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Pharmacokinetics of the Potential Drug Interaction Between HCV-796 and Desipramine
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead ECG.
